about_the_game:
It seems that you're here to discover the first third-person, pirate-themed Roguelike.

Although you're just an orphan, your role on this ship is far more important than you think – you're fighting for the lives of those you love. As a pirate from the Old Harlot, you must stop the rebellion. To do so, you'll need to become the most skilled thief and ruthless warrior. You'll learn the story of every crew member to influence their final decision, making each ending unique.

With each run, sea-worthy adventures await you!

Become the terror of the seas, striking enemies from the shadows or in open combat. Uncover secrets like a pirate king sailing the Grand Line and engage in epic battles in search of a legendary treasure. You'll write your own legend, one that mermaids will sing about across the oceans!

Have you ever played a roguelike where your growth is built around the pirate crew?

In a living hub, taking care of your crew and their stats determines access to shops and character upgrades. Their mood will decide whether you set off on your next expedition well-prepared, which means this isn’t a game for everyone – you’ll need to approach not only your resources strategically but also manage your entire crew to gain an edge on each run.

High Replay Value on Treacherous Waters

Every time you step aboard, you uncover new secrets. Together with your friend, you work to unravel the mystery of the impending rebellion, with limited time to figure out who in the crew is on your side. Each run presents a new, unknown story full of unexpected twists that change the course of events – failure comes with consequences you’ll feel in your pocket, because for a pirate, gold is the key to success!

Reasons You Don’t Want To Miss It:

  • The first story-driven 3D third-person roguelike.

  • The first roguelike with graphics as good as those in story-driven titles.

  • The first roguelike with stealth mechanics.

  • The first pirate-themed roguelike.

  • High replay value with an epic adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: In 'The Skyland Chronicles', mature content primarily manifests through intense battle scenes with no shortage of graphic details. Occasionally, there are also scenes with a hint of undress, showcasing a bit more of the human body.

name: The Skyland Chronicles
short_description: You are a bloody pirate. Ask yourself one question: are you ready to go all in? Every move is a high-stakes negotiation. Brutal finishers don’t just send enemies packing, they broadcast a clear message that there’s no bargaining left on the table. Remember, every decision is a declaration.
